meanings.sent1: The mated birds built a nest together.
meanings.sent2: The mated couple went for a walk holding hands.
meanings.sent3: The mated friends always supported each other through thick and thin.
meanings.sent4: Their mated hearts beat as one, inseparable.
meanings.sent5: The mated pair's love was evident in every glance they shared.

meanings.definition: Matched or united in a pair
meanings.sent1: The mated socks were neatly folded in the drawer.
meanings.sent2: The mated colors of the painting complemented each other perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The mated shoes danced together in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent4: The mated puzzle pieces fit snugly together, completing the picture.
meanings.sent5: The mated bookends held the books in place with precision.

meanings.sent1: The mated dogs welcomed a litter of puppies.
meanings.sent2: The mated lions roamed the savannah in search of prey.
meanings.sent3: The mated rabbits hopped around playfully in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The mated fish swam together in a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: The mated birds built a cozy nest for their upcoming family.
